name: compose
description: Epoca is an automated trading system based on machine learning, designed to operate on Bitcoin perpetual future contracts.

scripts.prune: docker container prune && docker image prune
scripts.test: npm run test-core && npm run test-prediction
scripts.test-core: docker exec api npm run test
scripts.test-core-api-error: docker exec api npm run test-api-error
scripts.test-core-auth: docker exec api npm run test-auth
scripts.test-core-candlestick: docker exec api npm run test-candlestick
scripts.test-core-database: docker exec api npm run test-db
scripts.test-core-gui-version: docker exec api npm run test-gui-version
scripts.test-core-ip-blacklist: docker exec api npm run test-ip-blacklist
scripts.test-core-notification: docker exec api npm run test-notification
scripts.test-core-server: docker exec api npm run test-server
scripts.test-core-trading-simulation: docker exec api npm run test-trading-simulation
scripts.test-core-utils: docker exec api npm run test-utils
scripts.test-prediction: docker exec prediction-api python -m unittest discover -s tests -p '*_test.py'
scripts.test-prediction-api-error: docker exec prediction-api python -m unittest discover -s tests -p 'api_error_test.py'
scripts.test-prediction-candlestick: docker exec prediction-api python -m unittest discover -s tests -p 'candlestick_test.py'
scripts.test-prediction-utils: docker exec prediction-api python -m unittest discover -s tests -p 'utilities_test.py'

author: Plutus
